org.jgentleframework.context.injecting
Interface ObjectBeanFactory

public interface ObjectBeanFactory

This class represents an ObjectBeanFactory in JGentle system, a core factory of the Provider which can return an Object instance (possibly shared or independent) when invoked. It manages all necessary information includes the meta objects (ObjectBindingConstant, ObjectAttach, ObjectConstant, ObjectBindingInterceptor, ... ) in order to instantiate bean.

On the other hand, it looks like similar to configurable class (extension of Configurable interface or AbstractConfig) class which provides a few methods in order to configure bean instance, however there is a difference that the configurable class is only runable at startup time (configuration time) while ObjectBeanFactory is only used at run-time.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
MetaDataFactory, ServiceHandler

load_BeanClass

void load_BeanClass(java.lang.Class<?> objClass,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.Object> notLazyList)
Creates the Definition bound to the given object class. If the given object class is not annotated with @Bean annotation, the default value will be used to create corresponding Definition.

Parameters:
objClass - the given object class.
notLazyList - the not lazy list

                    java.util.List<java.lang.Object> notLazyList,

Parameters:

notLazyList - the not lazy list
type - The Types indicates type of given object class, only object class is corresponding to given type to be in used.
